articles.author: Sakshi Tiwari
articles.title: Eurofighter Typhoons ‘Push Back’ F-35s To Strike Houthis; Experts Aghast Over UK’ Aircraft Carriers Absence - EurAsian Times
articles.description: The Pentagon recently announced that the US Central Command (CENTCOM), along with the UK military forces, carried out a new precision airstrike on Houthi militias in Yemen. “The militaries of the United States and the United Kingdom, at the direction of their…
articles.content:
The Pentagon recently announced that the US Central Command (CENTCOM), along with the UK military forces, carried out a new precision airstrike on Houthi militias in Yemen.
